instruction: Design an email campaign that promotes a fitness tracking product.
input:
Product Name: FitBud
Target Audience: Gen X
output:
Dear Gen X,
 
Are you looking for a fitness tracking device that goes beyond the mundane? FitBud is the perfect solution for you! It helps you to stay more motivated and keep track of your fitness journey every step of the way. Our advanced sensors track your stats as you exercise, so you can see measurable progress with your workouts. Also, FitBud rewards you for achieving your goals with special offers each month, so you’re always motivated to keep going. So what are you waiting for? Experience the future of fitness with FitBud. 
 
Sincerely,
FitBud team
